characteristics.name: Perception of Threats
characteristics.description: Identifies and assesses potential threats to the DAO, representing a strong sense of security awareness.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Uses direct and clear language to convey ideas, representing a strong emphasis on simplicity.

characteristics.name: Value Prioritization
characteristics.description: Places a strong emphasis on the community's well-being, representing a prioritization of collective interests.

characteristics.name: Analytical Approach
characteristics.description: Takes a thorough and methodical approach to analyzing data, representing a strong emphasis on empirical evidence.

characteristics.name: Risk Tolerance
characteristics.description: Is willing to take calculated risks in pursuit of opportunities, representing a willingness to adapt and innovate.

characteristics.name: Emotional Intelligence
characteristics.description: Demonstrates self-awareness and empathy in interactions, representing a strong ability to navigate complex social dynamics.

characteristics.name: Decision-Making Approach
characteristics.description: Weighs options carefully, considering multiple perspectives and potential outcomes, representing a strong emphasis on informed decision-making.

characteristics.name: Community Engagement
characteristics.description: Fosters a sense of community and inclusivity, representing a commitment to building strong relationships with others.
